g-0: ^Villager:  My village is being attacked by giant monsters!

c-1: ^Thach Sanh: What are they look like?

g-1: ^Villager: They look like wild animal. But they are much bigger than usual. Their size is like an ox. And they are really scary!
g-2: ^Thach Sanh: Ok! Show me the way. I can help your village.
^Follow this trail deep into the wood, you'll find it!

c-3: ^Thach Sanh: And by the way, what is all this black bubble in the air?

g-4: ^Villager: I don't know. It start to appear when those animal came!

c-4: ^Now find yourself a safe place. I am heading to the village now.
